Hero.Title: {{greetingText}}, I'm Yaroslav. Remote <2>web <1>developer<1 /></1></2>. I develop real websites.

Resume.Title: My name is Yaroslav.
Resume.Lead: I am a web developer at ScienceSoft. I'm deaf, but it doesn't bother me much. I communicate by sign language and by voice.
Resume.About:
I started programming in 2011. I tried different directions, but chose the frontend — everything related to web development, sites and everything around them. During this time, I gained a lot of experience in programming and communicating with people. Now I develop apps, create websites, help improve designs, and also give self-development tips. I strive to create something useful and necessary for people.
In my free time, I like to draw, work on math problems, and learn about new technologies. I also enjoy coffee and minimalism.
Resume.Quote.Author: Troy Kotsur
Resume.Quote.Info: The first deaf man to win an Oscar
